import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Container, Grid, Header, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react' import ClassFeatures from './ClassFeatures' export default function CharacterStats(props) { const className = useSelector(state=>state.class) const circle = { width: 35, height: 35, fontSize:'10px', padding:'6px', margin:'auto', marginTop:'10px', border:'lightgray solid 1px', borderRadius:'50px' } function modCalc(stat){ if(stat < 10){ return "-1" } else if(stat < 12){ return '0' } else{ return '+' + Math.floor((stat - 10)/2) } } return ( <> Strength
{props.stats[0]}
{modCalc(props.stats[0])} Dexterity
{props.stats[1]}
{modCalc(props.stats[1])}
Racial Traits
Constitution
{props.stats[2]}
{modCalc(props.stats[2])} Wisdom
{props.stats[3]}
{modCalc(props.stats[3])}
Class Traits
Intelligence
{props.stats[4]}
{modCalc(props.stats[4])} Charisma
{props.stats[5]}
{modCalc(props.stats[5])}
Class Traits
Class Features
Racial Traits
) }
